The Case of the Narcotics Racket
description: Joe Foster of the Houston, Texas vice squad poses as a dope pusher in a high school to find out why the youth of a middle-class community have begun smoking reefers.

title: The Case of the Strategic Air Command
The Case of the Berkshire Fires
The Case of the Reluctant Flop Artist
The Case of the Troubled Circus
The Case of the Crying Lady
The Case of the Wild Wind
The Case of the Fatal Warning
The Case of the Tattooed Man
The Case of the Dying Past
description: An attorney in Vermont hunts the killer of a leathermaker who still used the old, traditional methods.

title: The Case of the Invisible Mark
The Case of the Priceless Passport
description: Two U.S. Immigration agents are sent undercover to Acapulco, Mexico to find the source of forged passports being provided to undesirables seeking to enter the United States.

title: The Case of the Black Sheep
The Case of the Wholesale Burglaries
description: Portland, Oregon police detectives investigate a series of vicious armed robberies that are perpetrated by a pair of gunmen wearing Halloween masks who hold up small shop owners just before closing time and viciously pistol-whip their victims after rifling the cash register. The police develop a lead that points to denizens of church mission in a rundown portion of town.

title: The Case of the Part-Time Cop
The Case of the One-Eyed Jack
The Case of the Uncrowned Champ
The Case of the Deadly Delicacy
The Case of the Unknown Man
description: The Salt Lake City, Utah, police department are attempting to break up a chain of illegal gambling establishments run by the Syndicate. Although the police manage to knock off most of the dens, they still haven't identified the leader of the gambling ring. Similarly, the crooks haven't found the undercover cop who's supplying the information to the Vice Squad. The cops and crook engage in a deadly game of cat-and-mouse to see who can identify the others' key personnel first.

title: The Case of the Long, Dark Night
The Case of the Capital Crime
description: Police detectives in Washington D.C. investigate the murder of a pair of security guards working in a downtown department store. Although they quickly identify a suspect, finding him in a large city with plenty of places to hide proves much more difficult.

title: The Case of the Elusive Firebug
description: An arson investigator looking into a series of supposedly accidental fires uncovers evidence that points to a convicted pyromaniac as the culprit--but he's confined to a hospital for the criminally insane.

title: The Case of the Wild West
description: A small town in the far west is being taken over by a gang of crooks who are trying to pressure the residents into voting them into office. The local sheriff tries old west tactics to fight them.

title: The Case of the Desperate Moment
description: A warden who doesn't want to see any of his convicts get hurt faces down two inmates who are planning a prison revolt.

title: The Case of the Unwelcome Stranger
The Case of the One-Way Ticket
The Case of the Educated Prisoner
The Case of the Pot of Gold
The Case of the Hot Stock
description: A securities investigator goes after a swindler who's selling unregistered stock.

title: The Case of the Red Letter Day
The Case of the Second Chance
The Case of the Deadly Homburg
The Case of the Most Dangerous Game
The Case of the Phoney Paper
The Case of the Quiet Guest
description: Burglary detectives in Manchester, NH, search for a burglar who seems to be able to get through every locked door in town.

title: The Case of the Guardian Angel
The Case of the Hunted Hobo
description: The Chicago police investigate a series of armed robberies perpetrated upon couples parked in lovers lanes with the same modus operandi - the thief steals the boy's wallet and then pistol whips his girlfriend. Since the victims agree that the thug was dressed as a hobo, a vaudevillian turned police officer agrees to go undercover and to see if the thief can be found one of the area's hobo jungles.

title: The Case of the One-Armed Bandits
The Case of the Big Break
The Case of the Reluctant Thief
The Case of Operation Sabotage
The Case of the Silent War

roles.char: Chief of Police Alvin R. Randall
